title: The Best Celebrity Hair Changes of 2019
text:
Charlize Theron’s bob is now a bowl cut. Photo: @charlizeafrica/Instagram, Getty Images

There are so many celebrities, so many celebrities with hair, and so many celebrities with hair who decide to change it in some way, that it’s hard to keep up. Instead of individually reporting on every exciting and sometimes traumatizing celebrity hair change that comes our way, let’s just kick off the start of the new season (fall) with a hearty haul of celebrity haircuts and dye jobs and get it all over with at once. In no particular order, here are 21 celebrity hair changes from when it was summer and a few new ones from fall that you should look at now before they inevitably change again.

1. Demi Lovato

Demi Lovato used to have a dark-brown lob.

Now she has a dark-brown lob with lime-green tips!

2. Katherine Heigl

Katherine Heigl used to have bright-blonde hair (her signature.)

Now she has dark-brown hair! (It’s for a new Netflix series.)

3. Bella Hadid

Bella Hadid used to have brown hair.

Now she has sandy-blonde hair!

4. Harry Styles

Harry Styles used to have heartthrob hair.

Now he has a bowl cut and bangs!

5. Joe Keery

Joe Keery used to have ’80s heartthrob hair.

Now he has a bowl cut and bangs!

therapist: joe keery with bangs can’t hurt you

joe keery with bangs: pic.twitter.com/WTd3MJhoxx — mindy yorkes (@gertschase) September 13, 2019

6. Charlize Theron

Charlize Theron used to have a blunt, dark-brown bob.

Now she has a bowl cut and bangs!

7. Halsey

Halsey used to have dark hair with bangs.

Then she had shorter dark hair with rainbow bangs!

8. Kendall Jenner

Kendall Jenner used to have dark-brown hair.

Now she has sandy-blonde hair!

9. Liv Tyler

Liv Tyler used to have dark-brown hair with no bangs.

Now she has dark-brown hair with bangs!

10. Selena Gomez

Selena Gomez used to have a highlighted lob.

Now she has an ombre lob!

11. Bella Hadid Again

Bella Hadid used to have long, sandy-blonde hair.

Now she has short, recently lightened, sandy-blonde hair!

Halsey Again

Halsey used to have dark hair with rainbow bangs.

Then she had long brown hair with a rainbow part!

12. Hayley Williams

Hayley Williams used to have blonde hair.

Now she has two-toned mullet hair!

13. Khloe Kardashian

Khloe Kardashian used to have yellow-blonde hair.

Now she has cloud-blonde hair!

14. Joe Keery Again

Joe Keery used to have bangs.

therapist: joe keery with bangs can’t hurt you

joe keery with bangs: pic.twitter.com/WTd3MJhoxx — mindy yorkes (@gertschase) September 13, 2019

Now he still has bangs, he just styles them upward!

15. Maisie Williams

Williams used to have medium-length pastel hair with bangs.

Now she has a brunette bob with wispier bangs!

16. The Weeknd

The Weeknd used to have a beard and an afro.

Now he has no beard and a more rounded fro!

Photo: Tommaso Boddi/WireImage/Getty Images

17. Noah Centineo

Noah Centineo used to have a brown beard.

Now he has a bleach-blonde beard!

18. Kendall Jenner Again

Jenner had blonde hair.

Now she has dark-brown hair that People reports is “half a shade deeper” than her natural dark-brown hair!

19. Adam Levine

Adam Levine used to have a brown mohawk.

Now he has a blonde thing he calls a “Corn Hawk!”

20. Dua Lipa

Dua Lipa used to have a bob with no bangs.

Now she has a bob with bangs!

21. Halsey Yet Again

She’s back to black hair and no bangs (for now).
description: From Charlize Theron’s new bowl cut to Kendall Jenner’s flip-flopping blonde hair color, here are the best celebrity hair changes and celebrity hair transformations of 2019 so far.
